languages.text: "Вот ты заладил: механизмы, механизмы... А своих братьев тебе не жалко? Или в них шестеренок недостаточно?"

traits.locale_text: "Вот ты заладил: механизмы, механизмы... А своих братьев тебе не жалко? Даже мое сердце разрывалось при виде этих бедняг".

languages.text: "Mechanisms again... Don't you grieve for your fellow priests too? Or weren't there enough cogs in them for you?"
languages.original_text: "Вот ты заладил: механизмы, механизмы... А своих братьев тебе не жалко? Или в них шестеренок недостаточно?"

traits.locale_text: "Mechanisms again... Don't you grieve for your fellow priests too? Or weren't there enough cogs in them for you?"
"Mechanisms again... Don't you grieve for your fellow priests too? Or weren't there enough cogs in them for you?"
"Mechanisms again... Don't you grieve for your fellow priests too? Or weren't there enough cogs in them for you?"
"Mechanisms again... Don't you grieve for your fellow priests too? Or weren't there enough cogs in them for you?"
"Mechanisms again... Don't you grieve for your fellow priests too? Or weren't there enough cogs in them for you?"
"Mechanisms again... Don't you grieve for your fellow priests too? Or weren't there enough cogs in them for you?"

languages.text: 「また機械の話か…仲間の司祭たちのことは悼まないの？それとも、あなたにとっては彼らは歯車が足りなかった？」
languages.original_text: "Mechanisms again... Don't you grieve for your fellow priests too? Or weren't there enough cogs in them for you?"

traits.locale_text: 「また機械の話か…仲間の司祭たちのことは悼まないの？それとも、あなたにとっては彼らは歯車が足りなかった？」

languages.text: "Mechanismen wieder ... Trauert Ihr nicht auch um die anderen Priester? Oder hatten die für Euren Geschmack nicht genug Zahnräder in sich?"
languages.original_text: "Mechanisms again... Don't you grieve for your fellow priests too? Or weren't there enough cogs in them for you?"

traits.locale_text: "Mechanismen wieder ... Trauert Ihr nicht auch um die anderen Priester? Oder hatten die für Euren Geschmack nicht genug Zahnräder in sich?"

languages.text: « Toujours ces histoires de mécanismes... Et la perte de vos confrères technoprêtres, ça ne vous rend pas triste ? Peut-être qu'ils n'avaient pas suffisamment de rouages à votre goût ? »
languages.original_text: "Mechanisms again... Don't you grieve for your fellow priests too? Or weren't there enough cogs in them for you?"

traits.locale_text: « Toujours ces histoires de mécanismes... Et la perte de vos confrères technoprêtres, ça ne vous rend pas triste ? Peut-être qu'ils n'avaient pas suffisamment de rouages à votre goût ? »

languages.text: «Otra vez con los mecanismos... ¿Acaso no lamenta la pérdida de sus compañeros del clero? ¿O quizá les faltaban engranajes para darle pena?».
languages.original_text: "Mechanisms again... Don't you grieve for your fellow priests too? Or weren't there enough cogs in them for you?"

traits.locale_text: «Otra vez con los mecanismos... ¿Acaso no lamenta la pérdida de sus compañeros del clero? ¿O quizá les faltaban engranajes para darle pena?».

languages.text: “又是机器……你就不替你那些技术神甫同伴感到难过吗？还是说，对你而言，那些人肚子里的齿轮还不够多？”
languages.original_text: "Mechanisms again... Don't you grieve for your fellow priests too? Or weren't there enough cogs in them for you?"

traits.locale_text: “又是机器……你就不替你那些技术神甫同伴感到难过吗？还是说，对你而言，那些人肚子里的齿轮还不够多？”

languages.text: "Hay mekanizmana... Rahip yoldaşlarına üzülmüyor musun? Teknikçi olsalardı öyle demezdin tabii."
languages.original_text: "Mechanisms again... Don't you grieve for your fellow priests too? Or weren't there enough cogs in them for you?"

languages.original_text: "Mechanisms again... Don't you grieve for your fellow priests too? Or weren't there enough cogs in them for you?"
